0x3DDEB0E6.name: TASK_PLAY_ANIM_ADVANCED

params.name: ped
params.description: The ped you want to play the animation

params.name: posX
params.description: Initial X position of the task

params.name: posY
params.description: Initial Y position of the task

params.name: posZ
params.description: Initial Z position of the task

params.name: rotX
params.description: Initial X rotation of the task

params.name: rotY
params.description: Initial Y rotation of the task

params.name: rotZ
params.description: Initial Z rotation of the task

params.name: blendInSpeed
params.description: The speed at which the animation blends in. Lower is slower and higher is faster, 1.0 is normal, 8.0 is basically instant

params.name: blendOutSpeed
params.description: The speed at which the animation blends out. Lower is slower and higher is faster, 1.0 is normal, 8.0 is basically instant

params.name: duration
params.description: The duration of the animation in milliseconds. -1 will play the animation until canceled

params.name: animTime
params.description: Value between 0.0 and 1.0, lets you start an animation from the given point

0x3DDEB0E6.description:
Similar in functionality to [`TASK_PLAY_ANIM`](#\_0xEA47FE3719165B94), except the position and rotation parameters let you specify the initial position and rotation of the task. The ped is teleported to the position specified.
[Animations list](https://alexguirre.github.io/animations-list/)

**This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native [TASK_PLAY_ANIM_ADVANCED](?\_0x83CDB10EA29B370B).**
